attributes.action: ensure that all councils in UK ensure that the streets and roads are cleaned up as there are many people out there who don’t care about the environment and just dump litter. Also, put more signs up for a fine if people are cached litter bugging
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Who thinks that there are many streets and roads out there that are very dirty with bottles, rappers, packets and bags and not cleaned up very much in some parts of the UK?
